reviews.review: Heavily unbalanced toward the killer in the beginning and heavily unbalanced toward the survivor in the higher ranks.  Most of the perks are under powered and make little difference.  Community is toxic and other players generally try to enrage you when they win and cuss you out when they lose.
game lives up to it's title, i play until 5am and i want to kill myself
I think they've been doing a pretty good job so far
ÓTIMO JOGO PARA DESESTRESSAR  E MUITO BOM PRA ZOAR COM OS ZAMIGOS <3 amo vocês !

[h1] The worst developers for any game I've ever played. [/h1]

[b] This review is pretty long by my standards but if you've somehow come across this and not bought the game, I would highly suggest reading. [/b] 

This game is a broken mess that's flawed in just about every aspect. I won't focus too much on the community being terrible in this review (because you've probably heard it 100 times already) and instead focus on the game itself. 

Dead by Daylight has a monopoly on the cat-and-mouse genre, and this has resulted in the most inept, lazy development I have ever seen in a game. This is sadly what happens when a game has almost no competition whatsoever in the market.

Every single update comes with a variety of new bugs and issues, most of which never get fixed and are still in the game years later.

The developers are clearly solely interested in profit and ignore almost the entirety of community feedback. Perfect example of this is the Twins killer. The developers released the killer on PTB, got tonnes of negative feedback and game-breaking bugs, changed almost nothing and then released it anyway for full price. 

[h1]  Do you like grinding achievements?  [/h1]

Some achievements are straight up bugged, and others are unfairly difficult to obtain. When I say unfair I'm not claiming that they're just "too hard" because I have no problem with that, it's the fact that the conditions required to obtain them are usually outside of your control. For example:

Survivor adept achievements:

Escape using the survivor's 3 set perks, no questions asked.

Killer adept achievements:

You have to deliberately go out of your way to inefficiently kill everybody in the lobby just to please the outdated scoring system and get the "Merciless killer" rating.

You also have to do this with the 3 set perks for your killer, and depending on the killer these perks could be terrible (Huntress has 2 useless perks and 1 near-useless perk, Wraith has 2 useless perks and 1 somewhat okay perk, etc)

[b] Not only this, but if a survivor disconnects at any point during the game, you lose your entire attempt. This could be your 20th attempt at the achievement and you lose it because a survivor pressed Alt F4.[/b]


[h1]  You're new to the game?  [/h1]

If you only bought the standard game and no DLCs, prepare to grind for literally hundreds of hours if you want to unlock all of the characters (the characters that are even available without spending real money, that is). Even if you don't want to play as the character themselves, this will be your only way of unlocking a majority of the perks in the game unless you want to take the incredibly low chance that your desired perk will appear in the weekly shrine. (And even if this happens, I hope you have 2000 shards lying around / can grind for them within 7 days, or you're out of luck.)

[h1] You have hundreds of hours?  [/h1]

This game becomes more boring the higher ranked you get. The meta has been stale for years because a handful of perks dominate all other perks by an enormous margin. There is no freedom to customize your perk build to your playstyle without putting yourself at a heavy disadvantage by not taking the boring meta perks (this applies mostly to killers).

The worst offender here is Ruin / Undying,  two perks that have dominated the meta at the time of this review. By taking these boring meta perks, you are left with 2/4 perks to work with for your own playstyle. If you're playing certain killers such as Demogorgon, make that 1 since certain perks are essentially required to make them playable (Save the best for last).

The devs will take a perk that's blatantly overpowered (Decisive strike for example) and [b] maybe [/b] give it a [b] very minor nerf [/b] if people beg for it enough over the course of several months. Conversely, they'll take a terrible perk that clearly needs a massive buff to become viable and slightly tweak it which ultimately makes no difference. This game has horrendous balance and this is just one example of it.

The ranking system is a glorified skill-based matchmaking system that has no value other than bragging rights. You get no rewards for reaching the top ranks. Once you hit rank 1, there is effectively nothing to strive towards anymore.

Once you have perfect builds on all of your characters, bloodpoints become near-obsolete unless you care about the incredibly underwhelming prestige system. At this point, the only reward you get for playing are shards, so you can grind for an obscene amount of time for a singular cosmetic you may like. That's if the cosmetic is even available for shards, since some of them force you to pay real money. 

Dead by Daylight should be free to play. Fortnite, Rocket League and most mobile games have more modest micro-transactions and they're free. 

[h1] Terrible balancing  [/h1]

Many would agree that the most ridiculous example of terrible balance is the existence of keys. This item is essentially a free win button as survivor if you're still alive during the endgame. There is almost no counterplay as a killer and it results in survivors getting completely undeserved wins. The developers finally acknowledged this recently and instead of making a meaningful change, they instead completely insulted the entire killer playerbase by nerfing them so slightly that it makes almost no difference whatsoever.

Many of the killers in the game are horribly underpowered and the devs make no effort to rework or update their base kit to make them viable in high level gameplay. Some of these killers have extremely obvious (and usually very simple) tweaks that they desperately need but the devs don't bother. This means that by playing the lower end of killers, you choose to deliberately put yourself at a severe disadvantage purely due to laziness on the devs part.

To make matters worse, the devs are also painfully out of touch and make baffling choices that suggest they have zero understanding of the game. Rather than focus their limited efforts on one of the many killers that need attention (Myers, Trapper, Clown etc) they decided to nerf arguably the most fun and balanced killer in the game (Billy) for absolutely no reason and he's almost never played anymore. Great job!

[h1] In conclusion... [/h1]

This game is a joke at this point. Save your money.

If you aren't a competitive person and can put up with the ridiculous amount of issues in this game, then I'd say there's some fun in playing survivor with your friends. But that's about it. This game is absolutely not worth playing solo.

Playing survivor alone sucks because most survivors care purely about themselves and will leave you to die on your first hook even if you went out of your way to save them multiple times. Anybody can play however they want and I won't criticise that, but waiting 10 minutes for a lobby only to die because your teammates ditch you gets really tiresome. Some of the best perks in the game require coordination to work, and since the devs dont bother balance out the perks you're just playing at a huge disadvantage.

Playing killer is not fun 90% of the time. Most of your experience is just going to be confusion and frustration. If you dare to play in a way that upsets survivors (ie. killing them and doing your job), prepare to get flamed in post-game chat for not following the all-important unwritten survivor rulebook.

The tension dries up quickly because it's usually clear about halfway through the game who is going to win. You're either stomping the entire lobby, or getting bullied by a 4-man toxic SWF (group of friends) with meta perks, keys, flashlights, and insta heals. This is why queue times are so long. Nobody wants to play killer anymore.

I can only hope that Dead by Daylight gets some actual competition so that the developers are forced to either do their jobs properly, or watch a game that actually cares about their community take over the market. Either way works for me.

살인마 1명 대 생존자(생존마) 4명이라는 비대칭 게임의 아버지뻘 겜

게임 컨셉만큼 초반에는 잔인하고 무서워 할 수 있으나 100시간 넘길쯤부터 살인마를 놀리는 자신을 발견하게 될 것이다.
전승퍽 (30,35,40랩을 찍으면 다른 캐릭도 해당 캐릭 고유퍽을 사용 가능)이 중요한 겜인 만큼 초반에 전승퍽이 부족하면 다소 살인마에게 오버 밸런스로 느껴질 수는 있으나 과거에 비해 아카이브(미션을 통한 블포 제공)을 추가함으로서 나아진 편. 물론 양쪽이 전승퍽을 다 찍으면 생존자가 압도적으로 유리해진다. (개발진이 살인마보단 생존자 위주로 패치하는 경향이 강해서 그럼.) 다양한 퍽을 조합해 게임을 하면 새로운 재미를 느끼게 될 것이다.

참고로 이 겜은 4년째 오픈베타 느낌이므로 뭐만 패치하면 버그가 난다. (막말로 버그 수정못해서 캐릭 리워크하는 경우도 있다고 할 정도) 그럴때는 메튜 (데바데 개발진) 욕만 하면 된다. 4주년 기념의 글에서 개발진들의 말들이 나왔는 데 99개 버그 고치면 100개 버그가 새로 나온다고........ (패치 노트에 언급 안 된게 인게임에서 바뀌었다? 그럼 버그임. 버그로 게임 서버 통합된 적도 있고 다양해서 버그 보는 재미로 게임한다고 해도 무방. 사실상 엔티티가 운영중이라는 게 학계의 정설)

I have to say, I came in pretty late.

I've had this on the ps4 for a while, I remember playing similar games like Friday the 13th, which I really liked, and RE Resistance which has a similar type of play, which I also like, and I always knew this was probably fun, but I didn't try it.

So last steam sale I jumped right in, got several DLCs because everything so so low in price, and I was ready.

I LOVE THIS GAME. I love being the Killer too, mostly just because as a survivor is it pure horror and scary, but as killer you feel like you have the control in the horror movie itself. I love it, 

I don't really like their battle pass system, or the amount of micro transactions for skins, but that's about it, otherwise I love it. I can get tiring after a while, but that is all up to how long you love to play it and how much you love it. I can go for at least 3 hours without any issues.

8.5/10

ужасная игра, сама задумка интересная, графика и тд прикольно, но я бы такую игру даже даром не играл, ведь дохуя багов и подкруток маньякам.
За выжившего можно играть, но из за багов и маньяков с разными хуй-знает какими имбовыми способностями, пердак будет рвать крепко (пишу комментарий после катки, где я застрял в текстурках у подножья холма, все висели и я был последней надеждой, а хуй там, мне оставалось просто сидеть и ждать, как меня найдёт маньяк, самое главное, когда я был цел, я застрял в текстурах и не мог двигаться, а когда маньяк меня ударил, о чудо, я вновь могу двигаться (ползти) только куда бл??? И дааааа, в этой катке я просрал ремку и слил ранг) похлопаем разрабам этой игры не много ли они хотят денег за покупку игры и доната за такие дикие баги, не?????

Lots of tension, horror elements, pretty balanced most of the time, and the characters you can play are a lot of fun! And now that they have added cross platform playing there is a drastic reduction in waiting times for a game.

人鬼根本不平衡，就算不是AT團兩分鐘也不見兩到三台了。然後還一直把鬼nerf，護士改成每一瞬都要等CD，電鋸本來就沒很強也要改廢，就連能控場拖節奏的毀滅也改成垃圾，原因是為了迎合新手，不是叫新玩家訓練自己，練好QTE，而是把原有的技能改掉去迎合他們，有夠低能。把排隊改掉也是智障，玩鬼秒排，還把玩家實力弄得不平均，上一場有R20的，下一場4隻R1 三四千小時的。本來很久沒玩想打上R1看看的，結果每一場2分鐘就不見了三台，有時人太強的門開了還沒掛到人。排隊方面先不說，根本上環境對鬼是很不友善的，一大堆速修AT的修很快，還有工具箱，基本如果不是亂玩一直BM一直找箱子都不會輸。打到R2打不下去了，每一場還沒死人就先沒了兩台，也許是我太廢，但我覺得這本來對鬼就十分的不友善，不管是鬼本身的強度和平衡團隊本身，為了吸引更多的新玩家而直接放棄一些高階鬼還有想玩和想練鬼的玩家

Ce jeu est comment dire, catastrophique, personnellement je ne prends plus aucun plaisir en y jouant seule tellement la communauté est toxique on se demande si les développeurs jouent à leur jeu... Ah si, en partie personnalisée. 

Les devs ne prennent pas en compte les problèmes qu'il y a sur ce jeu comme les bugs ou encore l'optimisation de celui-ci, hâte de voir ce que ça va donner après cette fameuse maj graphique même s'ils ont déjà perdu toute crédibilité, donc si vous avez un vieux ou mauvais pc des fois dans certaines maps vous ne pourrez pas jouer au-delà de 50 FPS quel plaisir.

Mais rassurez-vous pour les skins ils sont à l'heure.
